entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
